name: Dodge
effect: Every success from this accuracy roll counts as a point of reduced accuracy on the Move targeting the user. To dodge you must spend a point of Evasion, this can be executed at any time as long as you have at least one point of Evasion active and only effects a singular move targeting the user. You can alternatively  sacrifice your full action to use this move.
description: The user focuses on their enemies' movements in an attempt to avoid their attacks.
